common.member_no_permissions_description: You need ``{{PERMISSIONS}}`` permissions on this guild
common.early_access_features_description:
Hey there! So, this new feature we've got is still in its early access phase. We're working hard to test and make it even better. But, just a heads up, early access means there might be some surprises like unexpected stuff, security things, or features that are still a work in progress.

If you're up for it, guild administrators can jump in and try it out by opting in through the settings

early_access_warning.title: Early access warning
early_access_warning.description:
Experience the newest features first with early access! Things might not be perfect yet, but your feedback helps us make it amazing. Contact us with the support command if you find anything

 You can disable early access features anytime in the settings

userinfo.title: User Information
userinfo.info: Show information of a specific user, such as status, activities, and more
userinfo.user_not_found: I cannot find that user, is your information correct?

say.title: Say
say.info: Make me say something that you want~
say.success: Done~, I posted a message with your content!
say.error: An error occurred while trying to post the message with your content!

purge.title: Purge
purge.info: Delete a certain amount of messages
purge.nan_error_description: The argument is not a number
purge.error_over_limit: The number of messages to delete is over the limit, the maximum is {{MAX}}
purge.error: An error occurred while purging messages

invite.title: Invite
invite.private: {{BOT_NAME}}'s invite is currently private. Only the developers can add me to another server

help.title: Help - {{BOT_NAME}}
help.prefix_description: You can call me using ``{{{PREFIX}}}``, {{{PREFIX_MENTION}}} or ``/slash command``

musicplayer.not_in_voice: You need to be in the voice channel first~
musicplayer.different_voice_channel: You are not in the same voice channel as me!
musicplayer.track_error: Error while playing music, skipping this track

musicplayer_join.success: Successfully joined the voice channel, I'm here now~
musicplayer_join.error: Unable to join the voice channel
musicplayer_join.disconnected_reason_disconnected: I got disconnected from the voice channel
musicplayer_join.in_use:
I can't join mutiple voice channel on the same guild.
 There are also somebody listening to the music in the voice channel I'm currently in.
musicplayer_join.in_use_wait: Wait until I finish playing there or I'm alone there. Better yet, join them!
musicplayer_join.can_force_move: **Or... just (ab)use your admin permissions and move me to where you want!**
musicplayer_join.already_joined_description: Already in the voice channel you are currently connected to

musicplayer_leave.success: Successfully left the voice channel, see ya!

musicplayer_loop.loop_set: Loop mode is now set to {{MODE}}

musicplayer_resume.not_paused: The music is already playing (Â´ï½¡â€¢ áµ• â€¢ï½¡`)

musicplayer_play.title: Play
musicplayer_play.error: Error while looking up the song

musicplayer_playmy.not_detected: You don't seem to be listening to any music currently according to your activity

musicplayer_queue.title: Queue
musicplayer_queue.song_x_in_queue: There are {{COUNT}} song in the queue!

musicplayer_skip.skipped_last_song: Skipped, that was the last song

settings_prefix.prefix_too_long_description: Can you even remember that? ðŸ˜†
settings_prefix.prefix_is_mention_description: You can already call me by mentioning me. I got that covered, don't worry
settings_prefix.prefix_updated_description: From now onwards, I shall be called by using ``{{{PREFIX}}}``

settings_purge_limit.info_description: Provide a new purge limit to change
settings_purge_limit.purge_limit_too_big: Purge limit too big, maximum is {{LIMIT}}

settings_language.language_invalid_description: The language code is invalid or not supported yet
